summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 283 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1748 m), feels like temperature (up 6.2°C), outside temperature (up 5.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 283.1m lower than yesterday, 1169.7m lower than past week, 1747.5m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 982.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dim outside. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
